titles.title: MEGOBARI Act
MEGOBARI Act
Mobilizing and Enhancing Georgiaâ€™s Options for Building Accountability, Resilience, and Independence Act
To require reports and certain actions with respect to the Republic of Georgia.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Intelligence (Permanent Select), Ways and Means, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
